translations: n.（北美的）大草原；蒸气火车头（Prairie）

sentences.sentence: The prairie vole is one such animal.
sentences.translation: 草原田鼠就是这样一种动物。

sentences.sentence: But winters on the prairie can still get pretty harsh today.
sentences.translation: 而草原上的冬天现在依旧是很严寒。

sentences.sentence: To assemble a prairie takes time—even if you have all the pieces.
sentences.translation: 组装一个大草原需要时间——即使你拥有所有的部件。
